Detailed Description

Obsolete - it is planned to drop the method Control::OnCancel as it can be replaced by simply using an Action and overwriting Control::OnActionExecuted instead.

Invokes Control::OnCancel() of the specified Control. Before the Action can be executed, it must be provided with a pointer to the Control by the constructor or by the method Init.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
